title: The simple solution to the world’s energy crisis
itunes:title: The simple solution to the world’s energy crisis
description: Amir Adnani—president, CEO, and co-founder of Uranium Energy Corp.—returns to the podcast to discuss the “no-brainer” fix to the world’s energy problems: uranium. He shares how Russia is weaponizing energy (after all, sanctions are a two-way street)... the two megatrends behind the uranium bull market… and how the U.S. could end up the big winner here.  In this episode   Russia’s impact on the uranium industry [3:25] The supply/demand imbalance is bullish for uranium [9:03] How the US could reap the rewards of the uranium bull market [16:20] Details of UEC’s latest acquisition [21:00] How high uranium prices could go [33:30]  Enjoyed this episode? Get Wall Street Unplugged delivered FREE to your inbox every Wednesday: https://www.curzioresearch.com/wall-street-unplugged/ Wall Street Unplugged podcast is available at: --: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/wall-street-unplugged-frank/ -- : https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/curzio-research/wall-street-unplugged-2 -- : https://www.curzioresearch.com/category/podcast/wall-street-unplugged/   : https://twitter.com/frankcurzio :. https://www.facebook.com/CurzioResearch/ : https://www.linkedin.com/in/frank-curzio-690561a7/ :
